bio: A wicked that's always flickering. It's difficult to see his true form.

soultimate.name: Flickering Frenzy
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally movement speed by 24% and Move Meter speed by 60% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Nearby allies' speed boosted for a time.

skill.effect: No longer attracts attention from foes.
skill.name: Secrecy

name: Flicker
